title: MY FAVORITE MARTIAN 21-24 [retr?tv]
description:
MY FAVORITE MARTIAN 
Starring  Bill Bixby as Tim O&#039;Hara and Ray Walston as Uncle Martin

21. Hitchhike to Mars   3/1/1964 
A local business finances a trip to Mars. Martin is interested in going along.
  Guest star: Herbert Rudley (J. M. Buckley), Alice Backes (Miss Maxwell), Vito Scotti (Waiter), Lillian Culver (Woman)

22. Uncle Martin&#039;s Broadcast    3/8/1964 
Tim&#039;s reporter career branches out to crime stories. Martin&#039;s antennae prove useful.
  Guest star: Don Haggerty (Sgt. Seeley), Dick Wilson (Charlie), Paul Sorenson (Jim), Lane Bradford (Harry), Roger Creed (Guard), Len Felber (Police Officer)

23. An Old, Old Friend of the Family     3/15/1964  
When an Asian Head of State visits the area, Martin intervenes to get Tim an exclusive.
  Guest star: Charles Maxwell (Jakobar), Henry Corden (East Indian), Bart Conrad (Guard #1), Joseph Perry (Guard #2)

24. Super-Duper Snooper    3/22/1964 
Martin finds himself as the target of snooping when Mrs. Brown takes up detective work as a hobby.
  Guest star: Cliff Norton (J. Nathaniel Pierce), Dennis Robertson (Charlie)
